explain: Patrick Kluivert, former Holland forward, starts his coaching career successfully with Curacao, leading them to advance to the second qualifying round in the CONCACAF World Cup qualification series.
Curacao has made significant progress in their 2018 World Cup qualification campaign, moving to the next stage of the competition after achieving a win under the leadership of Patrick Kluivert.

Patrick Kluivert made a successful start in the World Cup qualifying as coach of Curacao. They achieved a significant win by advancing to the second qualifying round in CONCACAF. This progression means that Curacao is one step closer to the 2018 World Cup. Additionally, in the first-round encounter, Kluivert's guidance helped the team secure a leading position from which they will now face Cuba in June.
